Profile HP is a global company that’s been in existence for over 70 years. Today, we are one of the world’s largest providers of information technology infrastructure, software, services, and solutions to individuals and organizations of all sizes. We are the #1 or #2 leader in almost all product categories in which we compete. HP has grown into a multi-billion dollar company with more than 300,000 employees who work in 170 countries. We offer the most complete end-to-end portfolio in the market which spans servers, storage, networking, personal systems, imaging and printing, software, services, and solutions. We bring the advantages of that scale, the breadth and depth of our portfolio, to solve our customers’ most challenging problems. Join HP and together we can create what comes next! The HP PPS IT organization is looking for an experienced candidate who possesses 10 years of hands-on SAP experience, with heavy emphasis on the Sales & Distribution (SD) module, in addition to having experience with the Materials Management (MM) and Warehouse Management (WM) modules. The position entails, but not limited to:- Using strong background and expertise in SAP Sales and Distribution, Materials Management, and Warehouse Management Modules, play multiple roles such as functional analyst, lead functional analyst, or project manager on Americas based projects with HP’s 3rd Party Logistics providers or contract manufacturing partners that ship on our behalf. - Performs analysis of cross-functional and complex business requirements. Drives the introduction of new, leading edge IT technologies to fulfill these complex business requirements effectively, efficiently and with high quality. - Designs complex cross-functional solutions for others to code.- Provides mentoring and guidance to other developers.- Sets team strategy and direction; represents team to senior management and client/customers.- Develops innovative multi-team solutions to complex problems. A preponderance of time is spent in strategic and creative problem solving.- Demonstrates broad technical leadership, impacting significant technical direction; exerts influence outside of immediate team and drives change.- Supports IT testing, User acceptance testing, implementation, and warranty as part of standard end to end project life cycle management.- Integrates technical expertise and business understanding to create superior solutions for the company and our partners.- Consults with team members and other organizations, and partners on complex issues.- Mentors others in the technology community; may publish or otherwise engage professionally outside of the company.- Knowledge of SAP IDocs and the associated inbound and outbound process routines is a must.- Knowledge of key EDI transactions that typically flow between SAP and a 3rd Party Logistics provider or contract manufacturer are key such as EDI 940, 856, 947, 945, and 850.- Expertise in supply chain processing, inbound logistics, warehouse management, and outbound logistics are also key.- Expertise in ABAP which would allow a functional analyst to debug develop project issues would also be very beneficial.','!*!Education and Experience Required: - (Technical) Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience and a minimum of 12 years of related experience or a Master’s degree and a minimum of 10 years of experience. Knowledge and Skills Required:- 10 or more years of experience using SAP, with a focus on the SD, MM, and WM modules.- Experience using inbound and outbound processing of SAP IDocs.- Experience using key EDI signals such as 940, 856, 947, 945, and 850.- Thorough knowledge of the ABAP language to perform debug processing is key.- Strong Business Analysis skills/experience.- Strong verbal and written communication skills; demonstrated influencing skills, high level of technical and team leadership skills.','Information Technology','United States-Texas-Houston','','Full-time','Day Job','Yes, 25 % of the Time','Sep 18, 2015','','Hewlett Packard is EEO F/M/Protected Veteran/ Individual with Disabilities','Hewlett Packard is EEO F/M/Protected Veteran/ Individual with Disabilities','Lead SAP Logistics Functional Analyst Company info Website : http://www.hp.com/
